title: The Writer's Almanac - Tuesday, October 20, 2020
description: It's the birthday of Jelly Roll Morton (1890-1941), considered the first true jazz composer because he was the first to write down his jazz tunes.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of Jelly Roll Morton (1890-1941), considered the first true jazz composer because he was the first to write down his jazz tunes.
